transform.heading: Transform your Mother Baby store with IChiba SaaS solutions for the mother and baby industry
transform.subHeading: Tailored solutions for Mother & Baby industry: addressing all your management needs.

items.title: Struggles when managing separate sales order

howDoes.label: Suitability
howDoes.heading: How does IChiba OnePlatform's Solution empower your business?

title: Manage thousand of products on multiples sales channels
Suggest selling by combo to boost the revenue
Increase brand recognition & sell on omni channel
Provide various convenient payment methods
Manage loyal customer information
Provide detailed debt/ revenue reports
subTitle: All products are classified by attributes (size, age, color, model,...) and are managed in one place. Automated synchronization of product data occurs between sales channels.

Automatically suggest grouping products with the same attributes to sell in combos: newborn combos, nutritional combos for pregnant women, weaning combos, birthday combos,... Suggest reasonable discounts when selling combo items to meet customer needs and ensure profit.
Launch marketing campaign on various channels to attract new customers. Track all orders from multiple channels and manage in one unified dashboard.
We integrate various payment gateways that are conveninent for your customers: cash, QR code, credit card, bank card.
Collect customer data, classify customers based on order information and order value. Build a points and discount system for loyal customers to maintain close relationships with them.
With weekly reports, we empower owners of mother and baby shops to manage their finances efficiently. Easily track your store's debt and revenue from anywhere, on any device.

items.title: Commerce Layer
items.content: Sell everywhere, manage orders in one place. Maximize effectiveness with better automation, data and intelligence.

items.title: Ship4P
items.content: A multi-carrier management software that allows you to purchase official shipping labels at the best rates.

weService.heading: We service 100+ businesses & process 10.000+ transactions everyday
weService.subHeading: Hear what custommers say about us.

content.title: Crochet clothes
content.des: From the initial consultation to the final delivery of the website, Crochet Clothes has experienced a seamless and efficient process. IChiba demonstrated a deep understanding of our business requirements and created a visually appealing and user-friendly website. The design and layout perfectly captured our brand identity and effectively showcased our products to our target audience.
